column4: what imap server do people recommend for a simple server with 1-2 users?  I've been trying installation and configuration of cyrus, courier, and it's not been a good experience.
dovecot is pretty easy
yes, take a look at /etc/dovecot.conf
I use dovecot, but I only experimented with dovecot in ssl, I have it listening local only
what's the easiest way to generate needed SSL files (cert?) for the dovecot server?  I used to do it via a makefile in Mandrake...
do you have some other imap running
you got me. I did some wacko fako stuff for my exeriments

if it's only on one computer, just have it listen locally. Then you don't need ssl for the connections.
I used this: /usr/share/doc/openssl/doc/HOWTO/certificates.txt.gz

it tells you how to make your own certificate, that you can use with dovecot
